shows.title: Anglican Women Novelists
shows.desc:
Come and explore how novelists Charlotte Brontë, Rose Macaulay, Dorothy L. Sayers, Elizabeth Goudge, Barbara Pym, Iris Murdoch, Monica Furlong and P.D. James were inspired to write fiction through their relationship with the Church of England.

With Judith Maltby, Alison Shell, Jessica Martin and Francis Spufford.
